articles.content: LAHORE: While incumbent Pakistan Cricket Board chairman Ramiz Raja despite all rumours remains very confident publicly about his future in the PCB, one can recall his predecessor Ehsan Mani also gave… [+5074 chars]

articles.title: Mitchell Santner's departure to Ireland delayed after testing positive for Covid - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Tour starts with first ODI on July 10, with Santner due to take over as captain for T20Is against Ireland, Scotland and Netherlands
articles.content: NewsTour starts with first ODI on July 10, with Santner due to take over as captain for T20Is against Ireland, Scotland and Netherlands
